results.content: I feel that this course is good for a student like me, a beginner student of Linux and the CLI.  I am also studying the book "The Linux Command Line", and I feel that this course is a good accompaniment to this book.  This course does a better job of explaining permissions, file ownership (the sticky bit), users and groups, than my book does.  Also, the background info on open source and licensing is useful and interesting.  Much thanks for this great course.
results.content_html: I feel that this course is good for a student like me, a beginner student of Linux and the CLI. I am also studying the book "The Linux Command Line", and I feel that this course is a good accompaniment to this book. This course does a better job of explaining permissions, file ownership (the sticky bit), users and groups, than my book does. Also, the background info on open source and licensing is useful and interesting. Much thanks for this great course.

results.content:
great course, sometimes it goes a little bit quick. but luckely you can revisit the lectures. I will
take the course again realy soon to prepare even better for the LPI exam.
results.content_html:
great course, sometimes it goes a little bit quick. but luckely you can revisit the lectures. I will

results.content:
I use Linux at home and and at work since 1998. After all this time, I still find there's always something new to learn.


I used this course in conjunction with the book "Linux Essentials, 2nd Edition" and was able to pass the LPI Linux Essentials exam on the first try. One thing that helped with review was going through the exam objectives from LPI and the corresponding videos in this course to reinforce areas where I was a little weak.

response.content: Hey congratulations. Well done. You are correct the the LPI website site objectives list is a great source on testing what you already know and what you need to study
response.content_html: Hey congratulations. Well done. You are correct the the LPI website site objectives list is a great source on testing what you already know and what you need to study

One thing that helped with review was going through the exam objectives from LPI and the corresponding videos in this course to reinforce areas where I was a little weak.
